account.title: Account to debit
account.available_accounts: You can't create a transaction if the account has a pending transaction, or the balance is 0, or if the accounts is being updated. please fouzia help me on the wording

confirmation.desc: An Operation Request will be sent to the members of the account. It will not be broadcasted to the blockchain until it is approved.

nonEIP55Warning: Auto-verification not available: carefully verify the address
parentFeeExceeded: Max operation fee exceeds ETH parent account balance
